text: The Blue Bird is a 1940 children's fantasy movie. This is about Germany during the 18th century. Shirley Temple plays Mytyl. This movie performed badly at the box office. It was, however, nominated for two Academy Awards. This movie was released in January 1940 by RKO Radio Pictures. Category:1940s drama movies Category:1940s fantasy movies Category:1940 movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies directed by Walter Lang
title: The Blue Bird (movie)
